name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Arctic Elephant Immersive Translation - Immersive | Free | PDF Translation

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free webpage and image translation, subtitle translation(YouTube, Netflix), integrated with DeepL, Baidu, GPT and other technologies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Arctic Elephant Immersive Translation - Taking You into an Immersive Bilingual Experience
ğŸ“£  This is a highly immersive translation tool. Accurate webpage translation, immersive bilingual comparison; Translate words as you please; Instantly converting images and text, receiving unanimous praise from cross-border e-commerce sellers; PDF documents support various academic fields and are integrated with powerful engines such as DeepL, ChatGPT, Google, and Baidu; Subtitle translation helps YouTube and other video platforms; Paired with convenient online translation and practical vocabulary. Let you travel freely in the language world and enjoy an efficient translation experience.
â­ Why choose us?
ğŸš€ If you enjoy the ultimate immersive experience, then please choose us. We truly provide you with a deep experience of the joy that translation brings from multiple dimensions such as bilingual comparison, product interaction, and UI interface!
ğŸš€ If you have high requirements for professionalism, then please choose us. We have gathered powerful translation engines such as DeepL, ChatGPT, Google, Baidu, etc., and are absolutely responsible for the translation results!
ğŸš€ If you have a need for comprehensive translation functionality, please choose us. We have various translation functions such as web page translation, stroke translation, PDF translation, image translation, online translation, etc., to meet your translation needs in multiple scenarios!
â­ What functions do we have?
ğŸš€ Web Translation: Whether browsing academic websites, news and information, or shopping pages, Arctic Elephant Immersive Translation can accurately translate the entire web content with just one click. The ultimate bilingual comparison experience preserves the original formatting, making it as smooth as reading native language web pages, easily crossing language barriers, and obtaining global information.
ğŸš€ Word based translation: When reading foreign articles, documents, or web pages, simply select the word, phrase, or sentence you want to translate, and you can instantly obtain an accurate translation without switching pages or windows. It is efficient and convenient, providing seamless support for your reading and learning.
ğŸš€ Image translation: One click image recognition, precise translation, and the translation result is directly displayed in the original image without the need for secondary editing. It has received unanimous praise from the cross-border e-commerce industry, greatly improving work efficiency. After the translation is completed, it can be copied and pasted for use.
ğŸš€PDF  Translation: DeepL, ChatGPT, Google, Baidu and other translation engines have formed a strong alliance, suitable for the vast majority of highly specialized fields. As a result, Arctic Elephant Immersive Translation has gained many fans in medical and other fields. The translation results retain the original layout without the need for secondary editing, and support intelligent processing of complex formulas, greatly improving learning efficiency.
ğŸš€ Subtitle Translation: Supports subtitle translation on multiple mainstream platforms such as YouTube. The screen and subtitles are synchronized in real-time, providing an accessible audio-visual feast.
ğŸš€ Word book: New words can be added to the word book with just one click, making it easy to review and consolidate at any time. The vocabulary book supports classification management, custom tags, voice reading and other functions, making it a powerful assistant for you to learn foreign languages, helping you accumulate vocabulary and improve language skills.
ğŸš€ Online Translation: Supports translation between hundreds of languages, paired with powerful engines such as Google Translate and Baidu Translate, retaining historical records for convenient and efficient translation.
ğŸ“£ Download Arctic Elephant Immersive Translation now and embark on your joyful translation journey!
